snippet: Lt. Gen. Michael T. Flynn appears likely to emerge as the angry voice of what could best be described as the alternative right of the American national security establishment....
abstract: Retired intelligence officer Lt Gen Michael T Flynn has become advisor to  Donald Trump, working to get him elected president while denouncing Obama administration's failure to quash Islamist militancy and criticizing Hillary Clinton; Flynn has transformed during fraught election year from one of military's most respected officers to one of its most partisan, taking on voice of alternative right as he inveighs against Washington elite.
lead_paragraph: Lt. Gen. Michael T. Flynn appears likely to emerge as the angry voice of what could best be described as the alternative right of the American national security establishment.

headline.main: Guiding Trump, an Ex-General Who Shakes His Fist at Washington
headline.print_headline: Ex-General Offers an Angry Voice of Authority

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
